thread.title: South Jersey's Burlington Coat Factory latest to drop Ivanka Trump
thread.title_full: South Jersey's Burlington Coat Factory latest to drop Ivanka Trump

author: Alison Smith
title: South Jersey's Burlington Coat Factory latest to drop Ivanka Trump
text:
South Jersey's Burlington Coat Factory latest to drop Ivanka Trump Updated: February 14, 2017 — 10:11 AM EST 188 Share 
Read more: #Grabyourwallet founder sees retailers dropping Ivanka Trump as a win 
The South Jersey retailer had carried 13 Ivanka Trump items online, #GrabYourWallet founder and former Philadelphian Shannon Coulter said. 
Burlington Coat factory suddenly has zero Ivanka items on its web site. At last check on 2/7 there were 13. Right now there are zero. pic.twitter.com/IMatEXzQNe 
— Shannon Coulter (@shannoncoulter) February 11, 2017 
A number of retailers have dropped the first daughter's brand in recent weeks, citing poor sales. 
"Over the past year, and particularly in the last half of 2016, sales of the brand have steadily declined to the point where it didn’t make good business sense for us to continue with the line for now," a Nordstrom spokesperson wrote in an email . "We've had a great relationship with the Ivanka Trump team." 
It wasn't clear whether Ivanka Trump products would continue to be sold in Burlington Coat Factory stores, Business Insider said .
